annotations.description: We were witnesses to an uneventful game without many stirring moments. There is definitely room for improvement in future games. This has been a real cat and mouse game, with the hosts coming out on top. The home team made a lot of passes and attempted to maintain possession. The away side's tactic was counter attacking.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has just finished.
Luciano Vietto (Atl. Madrid) jumps for a cross in the goal area and produces a fine header which goes narrowly wide of the left post! What a huge opportunity!

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 3 min. of added time.

Fernando Muslera was forced into action to thwart Oliver Torres (Atl. Madrid). He found himself some space after latching on to a pass and unleashed a shot to the right post but couldn't beat the keeper.

annotations.description: Goal! Antoine Griezmann (Atl. Madrid) fires home from very close range after latching on to a pass from Gabi. The score is 2:0.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The half time break is over and the second half is about to start.

Not the best game in the world so far but certainly not the worst either. Chances have been few. The home fans will be really pleased with what they've seen from their players so far. The tactic of the home side is slow build up play and the away side is creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle to end the first half and the players are now heading to their respective dressing rooms.
The players claim that Antoine Griezmann (Atl. Madrid) handled the ball and it seems they are right.

Gabi (Atl. Madrid) crosses the ball into the box from the free kick, but the defence clears the danger.

Koke (Atl. Madrid) attempted to send a defence splitting pass into space where Fernando Torres was lurking. It could have put him one on one with the goalkeeper, but one of the defending players somehow manages to avert the threat.

Hello to all football fans, we are here to bring you a live commentary of the following match, describing all the most interesting and important moments. We'll make sure you won't miss a thing, so just sit back and have fun.

We were witnesses to an uneventful game without many stirring moments. There is definitely room for improvement in future games. This has been a real cat and mouse game, with the hosts coming out on top. The home team made a lot of passes and attempted to maintain possession. The away side's tactic was counter attacking.
